snippet.title: The Legend of Zelda: Parallel Remodel V1.1 (ALTTP Hack)
snippet.description:
A complete video walkthrough with a 100% item collection for version 1.1 of The Legend of Zelda: Parallel Remodel. Played in real time on Snes9x 1.55 with re-records used to optimize video length.

Parallel Remodel is a dumbed-down fork of Parallel Worlds, which is one of the first fully completed mods of A Link to the Past. Parallel Worlds has excellent overworlds and caves, but the difficulty of the dungeons themselves is off the charts (extreme backtracking, bomb jumping, repetitive mini bosses, enemies that are too powerful). This fork of Parallel Worlds, released by PuzzleDude in 2012, attempts to address the biggest pitfalls of the original Parallel Worlds. The final result is that the new Parallel Remodel ended up being too linear, the difficulty is inconsistent now, among other things.

Download links:
PR v1.1: https://mega.nz/file/VmBUgYJQ#psT5_Qz7zBRLI7oKyHnV9FfkFXzrDkWsHtp_qyfXOiw
PR v1.1 (with MSU-1): https://mega.nz/file/Q6IUUKSL#UhgF-2R15EhL1dvlwOb3wjRDm0rIjvU4ekXKGkxvfno
MSU-1 Getting Started: https://www.zeldix.net/t1607-msu1-getting-started-guide
MSU-1 Patch and Audio Files: https://www.zeldix.net/t791-the-legend-of-zelda-a-link-to-the-past
UPS Patcher: https://mega.nz/file/w3BAFS7B#T1AEFUcJgp_rq5jeej-laObhhWT4S15iNFxZM3dXXMo
SNES Rom Utility: https://www.romhacking.net/download/utilities/593/

Note: You must use a US rom with no header. You need a UPS patcher. If your rom is headered, you will also need to download a special utility to remove the header (e.g. SNES Rom Utility).
File Name: Legend of Zelda, The: A Link to the Past [U] [!]
File Size: 1.024 KB (1,048,576 bytes)
Checksum: CRC32 777AAC2F

Zeldix Discord: https://discord.com/invite/gaHW5hg

0:01 Introduction
2:58 Guardhouse & Sewers
25:22 Collection 
46:45 Pendant 1: Nayru's Bay (Mothula)
52:47 Pendant 2: Din's Catacombs (Moldorm)
1:07:53 2nd Collection
1:20:13 {"Pendant 3"}: Farore's Isle (Helmasaur King)
1:37:23 Lv2 Tempered Sword & 3rd Collection
2:05:08 Hyrule Castle (Draegor)
2:18:06 Level 4: Darinia's Cavern (Vitreous)
2:41:23 Level 7: Impa's Ways (Moldorm)
2:50:19 4th Collection
2:59:19 Level 3: Nabooru's Hole (Helmasaur King)
3:15:59 Level 6: Sheik's Hideout (Vitreous, Mothula)
3:32:11 Level 5: Saria's Gardens (Blind)
4:04:42 Level 1: Rauru's Ruins (Arrghus)
4:25:37 Level 2: Ruto's Fortress (Kholdstare, Mothula)
4:40:45 Level 8: Parallel Tower [Icy World]
5:05:47 Lv4 Master Sword & Final Collection
5:18:43 FINAL BOSS: Ganon
5:22:45 Ending & Credits
